queryVO.mainQuery: SELECT helplinename ||' = '||pno1 as "Department Name & No.", 'normal' newstype FROM pgi_helpline_no WHERE deleted IS NULL and EMERGENCY=0 ORDER BY helplinename
SELECT helplinename ||' = '||pno1 as "Department Name & No.", 'breaking' newstype FROM pgi_helpline_no WHERE deleted IS NULL and EMERGENCY=1 ORDER BY helplinename

SELECT (SELECT str_first_name || ' ' || str_middle_name || ' ' || str_last_name FROM pist_emp_personnel_dtl WHERE str_emp_no = a.hgstr_emp_code AND gnum_hospital_code = a.gnum_hospital_code) AS "Doctor", (SELECT STR_DESIG_NAME FROM pist_designation_mst WHERE num_desig_id = b.num_desig_id AND gnum_isvalid = b.gnum_isvalid AND gnum_hospital_code = b.gnum_hospital_code) designation FROM hgbt_unit_consultant_mst a, pist_emp_cur_detail_dtl b WHERE hgnum_deptunitcode = #PK0# AND a.gnum_hospital_code = <HOSPITALCODE> AND hgstr_emp_code = b.str_emp_no AND a.gnum_isvalid = b.gnum_isvalid AND a.gnum_hospital_code = b.gnum_hospital_code ORDER BY hgnum_is_hou DESC, hgnum_hierarchy_level ASC
SELECT helplinename as "Department", pno1 "Phone No." FROM HDBT_HELPLINE_NO WHERE deleted IS NULL and EMERGENCY=0 and REGEXP_LIKE (UPPER (helplinename), '(#PARA#35#PARA#)+') ORDER BY helplinename
queryVO.totalRecordCountQuery: SELECT count(helplinename) FROM HDBT_HELPLINE_NO WHERE deleted IS NULL and EMERGENCY=0 and REGEXP_LIKE (UPPER (helplinename), '(#PARA#35#PARA#)+')

queryVO.mainQuery: SELECT helplinename as "Department", pno1 "Phone No." FROM HDBT_HELPLINE_NO WHERE deleted IS NULL and EMERGENCY=1 and REGEXP_LIKE (UPPER (helplinename), '(#PARA#35#PARA#)+') ORDER BY helplinename
queryVO.totalRecordCountQuery: SELECT count(helplinename) FROM HDBT_HELPLINE_NO WHERE deleted IS NULL and EMERGENCY=1 and REGEXP_LIKE (UPPER (helplinename), '(#PARA#35#PARA#)+')

queryVO.mainQuery: SELECT H.HDBNUM_KIOSK_NAME,H.HDBNUM_MENU_NAME MenuName, count(H.HDBNUM_MENU_NAME) as "use count" FROM HDBT_KIOSK_MENU_LOG_MST H where H.HDBNUM_KIOSK_ID like '#PARA#31#PARA#' and trunc(HDBDT_CLICK_DT) >= to_date('#PARA#32#PARA#','dd-mm-yy') and trunc(HDBDT_CLICK_DT) < to_date('#PARA#33#PARA#','dd-mm-yy')+1 group by H.HDBNUM_KIOSK_NAME, H.HDBNUM_MENU_NAME
queryVO.totalRecordCountQuery:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM( SELECT H.HDBNUM_KIOSK_NAME,H.HDBNUM_MENU_NAME MenuName, count(H.HDBNUM_MENU_NAME) as "use count" FROM HDBT_KIOSK_MENU_LOG_MST H where H.HDBNUM_KIOSK_ID like '#PARA#31#PARA#' and trunc(HDBDT_CLICK_DT) >= to_date('#PARA#32#PARA#','dd-mm-yy') and trunc(HDBDT_CLICK_DT) < to_date('#PARA#33#PARA#','dd-mm-yy')+1 group by H.HDBNUM_KIOSK_NAME, H.HDBNUM_MENU_NAME
)

queryVO.mainQuery: SELECT hgstr_unitname Unit, ahis_appointment.apt_get_token(unitdays (b.hgnum_deptunitcode, b.gnum_hospital_code),1,'#') "DAYS", NVL( (SELECT x.hgstr_room_name FROM hopt_dept_unit_roster_mst a,hgbt_room_mst x WHERE a.gnum_isvalid = 1 AND a.gnum_hospital_code = b.gnum_hospital_code AND a.hgnum_deptunitcode = b.hgnum_deptunitcode and x.hgnum_room_code = a.hgnum_room_code AND x.gnum_hospital_code = a.gnum_hospital_code AND x.gnum_isvalid = a.gnum_isvalid and rownum=1 ) ,'-')Room, NVL( (SELECT (SELECT str_first_name || ' ' || str_middle_name || ' ' || str_last_name FROM pist_emp_personnel_dtl WHERE str_emp_no = d.hgstr_emp_code AND gnum_hospital_code = d.gnum_hospital_code AND gnum_isvalid = 1) FROM hgbt_unit_consultant_mst d WHERE hgnum_deptunitcode = B.hgnum_deptunitcode AND gnum_isvalid = 1 AND hgnum_is_hou = 1 AND gnum_hospital_code = b.gnum_hospital_code),'-') AS "Head of Unit" , 'View'||'##'||b.hgnum_deptunitcode||'##1' as "Consultant" FROM hgbt_unit_mst b WHERE b.gnum_isvalid IN (1, 2) AND hgnum_isgeneral = 2 AND b.gnum_hospital_code = <HOSPITALCODE> AND TO_DATE (b.gdt_effective_frm, 'dd-Mon-yyyy') <= SYSDATE AND NVL (TO_DATE (b.gdt_effective_to, 'dd-Mon-yyyy'), SYSDATE) >= TRUNC (SYSDATE) AND b.hgnum_dept_code=#PARA#1#PARA# ORDER BY hgstr_unitname
queryVO.totalRecordCountQuery: SELECT count(*) FROM hgbt_unit_mst b WHERE b.gnum_isvalid IN (1, 2) AND hgnum_isgeneral = 2 AND b.gnum_hospital_code = <HOSPITALCODE> AND TO_DATE (b.gdt_effective_frm, 'dd-Mon-yyyy') <= SYSDATE AND NVL (TO_DATE (b.gdt_effective_to, 'dd-Mon-yyyy'), SYSDATE) >= TRUNC (SYSDATE) AND b.hgnum_dept_code=#PARA#1#PARA#

queryVO.mainQuery: select distinct DEPARTMENT_NAME as "DEPARTMENT" , decode(DEPARMENT_CATEGORY_ID,'1', 'General','2','Special') "OPD_Type" from HDBPGI_OPD_MST where DEPARTMENT_ID=#PARA#38#PARA# and DEPARMENT_CATEGORY_ID=#PARA#39#PARA#

select OPD_NAME, CONSULTANT as "CONSULTANT NAME(S)",LOCATION ,OPD_DAYS from ( SELECT NVL (om.department_category_name, '-') "OPD_NAME", REPLACE(NVL (om.consultant_name, ' '),',','
') AS "CONSULTANT", NVL (om.locinfo, '-') as "LOCATION" , NVL (om.working_days, '-') AS "OPD_DAYS" , DECODE (UPPER (SUBSTR (NVL (om.working_days, '---'), 1, 3)), 'MON', 1, 'TUE', 2, 'WED', 3, 'THU', 4, 'FRI', 5, 'SAT', 6, 'SUN', 7, 8 ) as days FROM HDBPGI_OPD_MST om WHERE om.department_id = #PARA#38#PARA# AND deparment_category_id =#PARA#39#PARA# ORDER BY om.department_category_name ,days )

SELECT glm.gstr_lab_short AS labname, COUNT (hivtnum_req_dno) test_count FROM hivt_requisition_dtl hrd, gblt_laboratory_mst glm WHERE gbnum_status_code IN (9, 16, 17, 18) AND SUBSTR (hivtnum_req_dno, 1, 3) = glm.gnum_hospital_code AND hrd.gnum_current_lab_code = glm.gnum_lab_code AND TO_DATE (TO_CHAR (glm.gdt_effective_frm, 'DD-Mon-YYYY'), 'dd-mm-yyyy') <= TO_DATE (SYSDATE) AND TO_DATE (NVL (glm.gdt_effective_to, SYSDATE)) >= TO_DATE (SYSDATE) AND glm.gbl_isvalid != 2 AND glm.gnum_lab_code =#PARA#27#PARA# AND glm.gnum_hospital_code =<HOSPITALCODE> GROUP BY glm.gstr_lab_short

SELECT A.STR_EMP_NO "Emp.No.", STR_EMP_FULL_NAME as "Name", (SELECT GSTR_DEPT_NAME FROM gblt_department_mst WHERE gnum_dept_code=A.gnum_dept_code AND GNUM_ISVALID = 1 AND gnum_hospital_code = A.gnum_hospital_code) as "Department", (SELECT GSTR_DESIG_NAME FROM GBLT_DESIGNATION_MST WHERE GNUM_DESIG_CODE = A.gnum_desig_code AND GNUM_ISVALID = 1 AND gnum_hospital_code =A.gnum_hospital_code) AS Designation, /*(SELECT INITCAP(GSTR_GENDER_NAME) FROM GBLT_GENDER_MST WHERE GSTR_GENDER_CODE=A.gstr_gender_code AND GNUM_ISVALID=1) ||'/'||ahis_util.DOB_AGE_ON (DT_BIRTH_DATE, SYSDATE) "Gender/Age",*/ CASE WHEN (LENGTH(A.GNUM_DEPT_CODE)>=3) THEN (SELECT HGSTR_DESCRIPTION FROM HGBT_LOCATION_MST WHERE HGNUM_LOCATION_CODE = (SELECT gnum_location_code FROM gblt_department_mst WHERE gnum_dept_code=A.gnum_dept_code AND GNUM_ISVALID = 1 AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE = A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE) AND GNUM_ISVALID = 1 AND gnum_hospital_code = A.gnum_hospital_code) ELSE '--' END "Location" FROM PIST_EMP_REGISTRATION_DTL A WHERE A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE = <HOSPITALCODE> AND UPPER (str_emp_full_name) ~ '#PARA#25#PARA#' AND A.gnum_desig_code=#PARA#24#PARA# /*and A.gstr_gender_code=#PARA#10#PARA#*/ and A.gnum_dept_code=#PARA#23#PARA# AND A.GNUM_ISVALID = 1 order by str_emp_full_name
queryVO.totalRecordCountQuery: select count(*) from ( SELECT A.STR_EMP_NO FROM PIST_EMP_REGISTRATION_DTL A WHERE A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE = <HOSPITALCODE> AND UPPER (str_emp_full_name)~'#PARA#25#PARA#' AND A.gnum_desig_code=#PARA#24#PARA# and A.gstr_gender_code=#PARA#10#PARA# and A.gnum_dept_code=#PARA#23#PARA# AND A.GNUM_ISVALID = 1 )

queryVO.mainQuery: SELECT distinct NVL (str_emp_full_name, '')|| '##'|| a.str_emp_no||'##1' consultant_Name, (select GSTR_DESIG_ST_NAME from GBLT_DESIGNATION_MST where GNUM_DESIG_CODE=a.gnum_desig_code AND gnum_isvalid = a.gnum_isvalid AND gnum_hospital_code = a.gnum_hospital_code)designation,(SELECT gstr_dept_name FROM gblt_department_mst WHERE gnum_dept_code = SUBSTR (c.hgnum_deptunitcode, 1, 3) AND gnum_isvalid = a.gnum_isvalid AND gnum_hospital_code = a.gnum_hospital_code ) department FROM pist_emp_registration_dtl a,HGBT_UNIT_CONSULTANT_MST c WHERE /*gnum_desig_code IN (SELECT num_desig_id FROM hgbt_doctor_desig_mapping WHERE gnum_isvalid=a.gnum_isvalid and hgnum_process_type = 2 AND gnum_hospital_code =a.gnum_hospital_code) AND*/ a.str_emp_no = c.hgstr_emp_code AND a.gnum_isvalid = 1 AND a.gnum_isvalid = c.gnum_isvalid AND a.gnum_hospital_code =<HOSPITALCODE> AND upper(STR_EMP_FULL_NAME) ~ '#PARA#36#PARA#' AND SUBSTR (c.hgnum_deptunitcode, 1, 3)=#PARA#18#PARA# AND c.gnum_hospital_code = a.gnum_hospital_code order by str_emp_full_name,department
queryVO.totalRecordCountQuery: select count(*) from ( SELECT distinct a.str_emp_no FROM pist_emp_registration_dtl a,HGBT_UNIT_CONSULTANT_MST c WHERE /*gnum_desig_code IN (SELECT num_desig_id FROM hgbt_doctor_desig_mapping WHERE gnum_isvalid=a.gnum_isvalid and hgnum_process_type = 2 AND gnum_hospital_code =a.gnum_hospital_code) AND*/ a.str_emp_no = c.hgstr_emp_code AND a.gnum_isvalid = 1 AND a.gnum_isvalid = c.gnum_isvalid AND a.gnum_hospital_code =<HOSPITALCODE> AND upper(STR_EMP_FULL_NAME) ~ '#PARA#36#PARA#' AND SUBSTR (c.hgnum_deptunitcode, 1, 3)=#PARA#18#PARA# AND c.gnum_hospital_code = a.gnum_hospital_code )

queryVO.mainQuery: SELECT TO_CHAR (dt_holiday, 'dd-Mon-yyyy') "Date ", INITCAP (TO_CHAR (dt_holiday, 'day')) "DAY", str_holiday_name "Holiday Name", (SELECT str_holiday_type_name FROM pist_holiday_type_sys b where b.num_holiday_type_id=a.num_holiday_type_id) as Holiday_Type FROM pist_holiday_mst a WHERE gnum_hospital_code =<HOSPITALCODE> AND gnum_isvalid = 1 AND TO_CHAR (DT_HOLIDAY, 'YYYY') =#PARA#19#PARA# AND a.num_holiday_type_id= '#PARA#20#PARA#' ORDER BY dt_holiday
queryVO.totalRecordCountQuery: select count(*) from ( SELECT dt_holiday FROM pist_holiday_mst a WHERE gnum_hospital_code =<HOSPITALCODE> AND gnum_isvalid = 1 AND TO_CHAR (DT_HOLIDAY, 'YYYY') =#PARA#19#PARA# AND a.num_holiday_type_id= '#PARA#20#PARA#' )

queryVO.mainQuery: SELECT STR_EMP_FULL_NAME AS "NAME", (SELECT GSTR_DEPT_NAME FROM GBLT_DEPARTMENT_MST WHERE GNUM_DEPT_CODE=A.GNUM_DEPT_CODE AND GNUM_ISVALID = 1 AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE = A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE) AS "DEPARTMENT", num_mobile_no "telephone/mobile no." FROM PIST_EMP_REGISTRATION_DTL A WHERE A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE = <HOSPITALCODE> AND UPPER (str_emp_full_name) ~ '#PARA#25#PARA#' and A.gnum_dept_code=#PARA#23#PARA# AND A.GNUM_ISVALID = 1 ORDER BY STR_EMP_FULL_NAME
queryVO.totalRecordCountQuery: select count(*) from ( SELECT STR_EMP_FULL_NAME FROM PIST_EMP_REGISTRATION_DTL A WHERE A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE = <HOSPITALCODE> AND UPPER (str_emp_full_name) ~ '#PARA#25#PARA#' and A.gnum_dept_code=#PARA#23#PARA# AND A.GNUM_ISVALID = 1 )

queryVO.mainQuery: SELECT DISTINCT NVL (STR_EMP_FULL_NAME, '') CONSULTANT_NAME, (SELECT GSTR_DESIG_ST_NAME FROM GBLT_DESIGNATION_MST WHERE GNUM_DESIG_CODE=A.GNUM_DESIG_CODE AND GNUM_ISVALID = A.GNUM_ISVALID AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE = A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE)DESIGNATION FROM PIST_EMP_REGISTRATION_DTL A,HGBT_UNIT_CONSULTANT_MST C WHERE /*GNUM_DESIG_CODE IN (SELECT NUM_DESIG_ID FROM HGBT_DOCTOR_DESIG_MAPPING WHERE GNUM_ISVALID=A.GNUM_ISVALID AND HGNUM_PROCESS_TYPE = 2 AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE =A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE) AND*/ A.STR_EMP_NO = C.HGSTR_EMP_CODE AND A.GNUM_ISVALID = 1 AND A.GNUM_ISVALID = C.GNUM_ISVALID AND A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE =101 AND C.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE = A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE AND A.STR_EMP_NO='#PK0#'

SELECT DEPARTMENT,UNIT,DAYS, LOCATION FROM ( SELECT distinct GSTR_DEPT_NAME DEPARTMENT, HGSTR_UNITNAME AS UNIT, NVL(AHIS_APPOINTMENT.APT_GET_TOKEN(pkg_reg_util.unit_room_time_display (A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE::character varying,A.HGNUM_DEPTUNITCODE::character varying),1,'#'),'-') AS DAYS, (select hgstr_description || ' ' || hgstr_landmark from HGBT_LOCATION_MST where gnum_isvalid=1 and gnum_hospital_code=A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE and hgnum_location_code= A.HGNUM_LOCATION_CODE ) As location --pkg_reg_util.unit_room_time_display FROM HGBT_UNIT_MST A, HGBT_UNIT_CONSULTANT_MST D, GBLT_DEPARTMENT_MST B,HGBT_LOCATION_MST L WHERE (D.HGNUM_DEPTUNITCODE = A.HGNUM_DEPTUNITCODE) AND A.GNUM_DEPT_CODE = B.GNUM_DEPT_CODE AND D.HGSTR_EMP_CODE ='#PK0#' AND A.GNUM_ISVALID = 1 AND B.GNUM_ISVALID = A.GNUM_ISVALID AND D.GNUM_ISVALID = A.GNUM_ISVALID AND A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE =<HOSPITALCODE> AND B.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE = A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE )
queryVO.totalRecordCountQuery: SELECT count(*) FROM ( SELECT distinct GSTR_DEPT_NAME DEPARTMENT, HGSTR_UNITNAME AS UNIT, NVL(AHIS_APPOINTMENT.APT_GET_TOKEN(pkg_reg_util.unit_room_time_display (A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE::character varying,A.HGNUM_DEPTUNITCODE::character varying),1,'#'),'-') AS DAYS, (select hgstr_description || ' ' || hgstr_landmark from HGBT_LOCATION_MST where gnum_isvalid=1 and gnum_hospital_code=A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE and hgnum_location_code= A.HGNUM_LOCATION_CODE ) As location --pkg_reg_util.unit_room_time_display FROM HGBT_UNIT_MST A, HGBT_UNIT_CONSULTANT_MST D, GBLT_DEPARTMENT_MST B,HGBT_LOCATION_MST L WHERE (D.HGNUM_DEPTUNITCODE = A.HGNUM_DEPTUNITCODE) AND A.GNUM_DEPT_CODE = B.GNUM_DEPT_CODE AND D.HGSTR_EMP_CODE ='#PK0#' AND A.GNUM_ISVALID = 1 AND B.GNUM_ISVALID = A.GNUM_ISVALID AND D.GNUM_ISVALID = A.GNUM_ISVALID AND A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE =<HOSPITALCODE> AND B.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE = A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE )

queryVO.mainQuery: SELECT hblstr_tariff_name||'##'||hblnum_tariff_id||'##1' as "Tariff Name" FROM hblt_tariff_mst a WHERE gnum_hospital_code = <HOSPITALCODE> AND gnum_isvalid = 1 AND hblnum_group_id =#PARA#21#PARA# AND UPPER (hblstr_tariff_name)~ '#PARA#22#PARA#' AND TRUNC (gdt_effective_frm) <= TRUNC (SYSDATE) ORDER BY hblstr_tariff_name
queryVO.totalRecordCountQuery: SELECT count(*) FROM hblt_tariff_mst a WHERE gnum_hospital_code = <HOSPITALCODE> AND gnum_isvalid = 1 AND hblnum_group_id =#PARA#21#PARA# AND UPPER (hblstr_tariff_name)~ '#PARA#22#PARA#' AND TRUNC (gdt_effective_frm) <= TRUNC (SYSDATE)

queryVO.mainQuery: SELECT DISTINCT gstr_test_name || '##' || gnum_test_code || '##1' as TEST_NAME FROM hivt_laboratory_test_dtl a,gblt_test_mst b WHERE a.gnum_isvalid = 1 and UPPER (gstr_test_name)~ '#PARA#26#PARA#' and SUBSTR (a.gnum_lab_test_code, 1, 5)= #PARA#27#PARA# and SUBSTR (a.gnum_lab_test_code, 6, 10)=gnum_test_code AND a.gnum_hospital_code = <HOSPITALCODE> AND b.gnum_hospital_code = a.gnum_hospital_code AND b.gdt_effective_frm <= SYSDATE AND (TO_DATE (NVL (b.gdt_effective_to, SYSDATE), 'DD-MM-YY') >= TO_DATE (SYSDATE, 'DD-MM-YY')) AND b.gnum_isvalid = a.gnum_isvalid and exists (select 1 from gblt_department_mst d , gblt_laboratory_mst l where l.GNUM_DEPT_CODE=d.GNUM_DEPT_CODE and l.GBL_ISVALID= 1 and d.GNUM_ISVALID=1 and l.gnum_hospital_code=d.gnum_hospital_code and a.gnum_hospital_code=l.gnum_hospital_code and substr(a.GNUM_LAB_TEST_CODE,1,5)=l.GNUM_LAB_CODE ) ORDER BY TEST_NAME
queryVO.totalRecordCountQuery: select count(*) from ( SELECT DISTINCT gstr_test_name || '##' || gnum_test_code || '##1' as TEST_NAME FROM hivt_laboratory_test_dtl a,gblt_test_mst b WHERE a.gnum_isvalid = 1 and UPPER (gstr_test_name)~ '#PARA#26#PARA#' and SUBSTR (a.gnum_lab_test_code, 1, 5)= #PARA#27#PARA# and SUBSTR (a.gnum_lab_test_code, 6, 10)=gnum_test_code AND a.gnum_hospital_code = <HOSPITALCODE> AND b.gnum_hospital_code = a.gnum_hospital_code AND b.gdt_effective_frm <= SYSDATE AND (TO_DATE (NVL (b.gdt_effective_to, SYSDATE), 'DD-MM-YY') >= TO_DATE (SYSDATE, 'DD-MM-YY')) AND b.gnum_isvalid = a.gnum_isvalid and exists (select 1 from gblt_department_mst d , gblt_laboratory_mst l where l.GNUM_DEPT_CODE=d.GNUM_DEPT_CODE and l.GBL_ISVALID= 1 and d.GNUM_ISVALID=1 and l.gnum_hospital_code=d.gnum_hospital_code and a.gnum_hospital_code=l.gnum_hospital_code and substr(a.GNUM_LAB_TEST_CODE,1,5)=l.GNUM_LAB_CODE ) )

queryVO.mainQuery:
SELECT DISTINCT (SELECT GSTR_DEPT_NAME FROM GBLT_DEPARTMENT_MST WHERE GNUM_ISVALID = C.GBL_ISVALID AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE = c.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE AND GNUM_DEPT_CODE = C.GNUM_DEPT_CODE AND GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM <= SYSDATE AND (TO_DATE (NVL (GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO, SYSDATE), 'DD-MM-YY') >= TO_DATE (SYSDATE, 'DD-MM-YY') )) "DEPARTMENT", GSTR_LAB_NAME "LAB_NAME", nvl((SELECT nvl(STR_BUILDING_NAME,'-') FROM EST_BUILDING_MST WHERE GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE = c.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE AND GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM <= SYSDATE AND NVL (GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO, SYSDATE) >= SYSDATE AND GNUM_ISVALID = 1 AND NUM_BUILDING_CODE = C.NUM_BUILDING_CODE) , '') as building,
NVL ((SELECT STR_BLOCK_NAME FROM EST_BLOCK_MST WHERE NUM_BLOCK_ID = C.NUM_BLOCK_ID AND NUM_HOSPITAL_CODE = c.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE AND GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM <= SYSDATE AND NVL (GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO, SYSDATE) >= SYSDATE AND GNUM_ISVALID = 1), '' ) as Block,
NVL ((SELECT STR_FLOOR_NAME FROM EST_FLOOR_MST WHERE NUM_FLOOR_ID = C.NUM_FLOOR_ID AND NUM_HOSPITAL_CODE = c.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE AND GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM <= SYSDATE AND NVL (GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO, SYSDATE) >= SYSDATE AND GNUM_ISVALID = 1), '' ) as Floor, NVL ((SELECT STR_ROOM_NAME FROM EST_ROOM_MST WHERE NUM_ROOM_ID = C.NUM_ROOM_ID AND NUM_HOSPITAL_CODE = c.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE AND GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM <= SYSDATE AND NVL (GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO, SYSDATE) >= SYSDATE AND GNUM_ISVALID = 1), '' ) as Room
FROM GBLT_LABORATORY_MST C WHERE SUBSTR (c.GNUM_LAB_CODE, 1, 5) = #PK0# AND C.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE = <HOSPITALCODE> AND C.GBL_ISVALID = 1

select COLLECTION_AREA AS "COLLECTION AREA", decode(ROOM,null,' ', 'ROOM NO:-'||ROOM ||',' ) || decode(FLOOR,null,' ', FLOOR ||',' ) || decode(BLOCK,null,' ', BLOCK ||',' ) || decode(BUILDING,null,' ', BUILDING ) AS "LOCATION" from ( SELECT HSCAM.GSTR_AREA_NAME AS COLLECTION_AREA, (SELECT STR_ROOM_NAME FROM EST_ROOM_MST WHERE GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM <= SYSDATE AND NVL (GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO, SYSDATE) >= SYSDATE AND GNUM_ISVALID = 1 AND NUM_ROOM_ID = HSCAM.NUM_ROOM_ID AND NUM_HOSPITAL_CODE = HSCAM.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE) AS ROOM, (SELECT STR_FLOOR_NAME FROM EST_FLOOR_MST WHERE GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM <= SYSDATE AND NVL (GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO, SYSDATE) >= SYSDATE AND GNUM_ISVALID = 1 AND NUM_FLOOR_ID = HSCAM.NUM_FLOOR_ID AND NUM_HOSPITAL_CODE = HSCAM.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE) AS FLOOR, (SELECT STR_BLOCK_NAME FROM EST_BLOCK_MST WHERE GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM <= SYSDATE AND NVL (GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO, SYSDATE) >= SYSDATE AND GNUM_ISVALID = 1 AND NUM_BLOCK_ID = HSCAM.NUM_BLOCK_ID AND NUM_HOSPITAL_CODE = HSCAM.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE) AS BLOCK, nvl((SELECT nvl(STR_BUILDING_NAME,'-') FROM EST_BUILDING_MST WHERE GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE = HSCAM.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE AND GNUM_ISVALID = 1 AND NUM_BUILDING_CODE = HSCAM.NUM_BUILDING_CODE) , '') AS BUILDING FROM HIVT_LAB_COLLECTION_AREA_MST HLCAM, HIVT_SAM_COL_AREA_MST HSCAM WHERE hlcam.gnum_area_code = hscam.gnum_area_code AND hlcam.gnum_lab_code = SUBSTR(#PK0#,1,5) AND hlcam.gnum_hospital_code = <HOSPITALCODE> AND hlcam.gnum_isvalid = 1 AND hscam.gnum_isvalid = 1) ORDER BY COLLECTION_AREA

SELECT gstr_test_name "Test Name", decode(substr(gchar_test_day,1,1),'1','Sun','') || decode(substr(gchar_test_day,2,1),'1','Mon,','') || decode(substr(gchar_test_day,3,1),'1','Tue,','') || decode(substr(gchar_test_day,4,1),'1','Wed,','') || decode(substr(gchar_test_day,5,1),'1','Thu,','') || decode(substr(gchar_test_day,6,1),'1','Fri,','') || decode(substr(gchar_test_day,7,1),'1','Sat,','')
"Test Day", b.gstr_remarks "Pre-Requisite", gstr_turnaround_time "Time"
FROM hivt_laboratory_test_dtl a,gblt_test_mst b WHERE gnum_test_code = SUBSTR (a.gnum_lab_test_code, 6, 10) AND SUBSTR (a.gnum_lab_test_code, 1, 5) = #PK0# AND a.gnum_hospital_code = <HOSPITALCODE> AND a.gnum_isvalid = 1 AND b.gnum_hospital_code = a.gnum_hospital_code AND b.gnum_isvalid = a.gnum_isvalid AND b.gdt_effective_frm <= SYSDATE AND (TO_DATE (NVL (b.gdt_effective_to, SYSDATE), 'DD-MM-YY') >= TO_DATE (SYSDATE, 'DD-MM-YY')) ORDER BY gstr_test_name
queryVO.totalRecordCountQuery: SELECT count(*) FROM hivt_laboratory_test_dtl a,gblt_test_mst b WHERE gnum_test_code = SUBSTR (a.gnum_lab_test_code, 6, 10) AND SUBSTR (a.gnum_lab_test_code, 1, 5) = #PK0# AND a.gnum_hospital_code = <HOSPITALCODE> AND a.gnum_isvalid = 1 AND b.gnum_hospital_code = a.gnum_hospital_code AND b.gnum_isvalid = a.gnum_isvalid AND b.gdt_effective_frm <= SYSDATE AND (TO_DATE (NVL (b.gdt_effective_to, SYSDATE), 'DD-MM-YY') >= TO_DATE (SYSDATE, 'DD-MM-YY'))

queryVO.mainQuery:
SELECT DISTINCT (SELECT GSTR_DEPT_NAME FROM GBLT_DEPARTMENT_MST WHERE GNUM_ISVALID = C.GBL_ISVALID AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE = c.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE AND GNUM_DEPT_CODE = C.GNUM_DEPT_CODE ) "DEPARTMENT", GSTR_LAB_NAME "LAB_NAME", NVL ((SELECT STR_BUILDING_NAME FROM EST_BUILDING_MST WHERE GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE = c.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE AND GNUM_ISVALID = 1 AND NUM_BUILDING_CODE = C.NUM_BUILDING_CODE), ' ' ) as building, NVL ((SELECT STR_BLOCK_NAME FROM EST_BLOCK_MST WHERE NUM_BLOCK_ID = C.NUM_BLOCK_ID AND NUM_HOSPITAL_CODE = c.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE AND GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM <= SYSDATE AND NVL (GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO, SYSDATE) >= SYSDATE AND GNUM_ISVALID = 1), '' ) as block,
NVL ((SELECT STR_FLOOR_NAME FROM EST_FLOOR_MST WHERE NUM_FLOOR_ID = C.NUM_FLOOR_ID AND NUM_HOSPITAL_CODE = c.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE AND GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM <= SYSDATE AND NVL (GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO, SYSDATE) >= SYSDATE AND GNUM_ISVALID = 1), '' ) as floor,
NVL ((SELECT STR_ROOM_NAME FROM EST_ROOM_MST WHERE NUM_ROOM_ID = C.NUM_ROOM_ID AND NUM_HOSPITAL_CODE = c.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE AND GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM <= SYSDATE AND NVL (GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO, SYSDATE) >= SYSDATE AND GNUM_ISVALID = 1), '' ) as room,
GSTR_TEST_NAME "TEST_NAME", decode(substr(gchar_test_day,1,1),'1','Sun','') || decode(substr(gchar_test_day,2,1),'1','Mon,','') || decode(substr(gchar_test_day,3,1),'1','Tue,','') || decode(substr(gchar_test_day,4,1),'1','Wed,','') || decode(substr(gchar_test_day,5,1),'1','Thu,','') || decode(substr(gchar_test_day,6,1),'1','Fri,','') || decode(substr(gchar_test_day,7,1),'1','Sat,','') AS "TEST_DAYS" FROM GBLT_LABORATORY_MST C,HIVT_LABORATORY_TEST_DTL A,GBLT_TEST_MST B WHERE SUBSTR (A.GNUM_LAB_TEST_CODE, 6, 10)= GNUM_TEST_CODE and c.GNUM_LAB_CODE= SUBSTR (A.GNUM_LAB_TEST_CODE, 1, 5)
and GNUM_TEST_CODE= #PK0# AND A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE = <HOSPITALCODE> AND A.GNUM_ISVALID = 1 AND B.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE = A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE AND B.GNUM_ISVALID = A.GNUM_ISVALID AND c.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE = A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE AND c.GBL_ISVALID = 1
AND B.GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM <= SYSDATE AND (TO_DATE (NVL (B.GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO, SYSDATE), 'DD-MM-YY') >= TO_DATE (SYSDATE, 'DD-MM-YY'))

SELECT LAB_NAME,COLLECTION_AREA, decode(ROOM,null,' ', 'ROOM NO:-'|| ROOM ||',' ) || decode(FLOOR,null,' ', FLOOR ||',' ) || decode(BLOCK,null,' ', BLOCK ||',' ) || decode(BUILDING,null,' ', BUILDING ) AS "LOCATION" FROM (SELECT (SELECT INITCAP(GSTR_LAB_NAME) FROM GBLT_LABORATORY_MST WHERE GBL_ISVALID=1 AND GNUM_LAB_CODE=HLCAM.GNUM_LAB_CODE) AS LAB_NAME, HSCAM.GSTR_AREA_NAME AS COLLECTION_AREA, (SELECT STR_ROOM_NAME FROM EST_ROOM_MST WHERE GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM <= SYSDATE AND NVL (GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO, SYSDATE) >= SYSDATE AND GNUM_ISVALID = 1 AND NUM_ROOM_ID = HSCAM.NUM_ROOM_ID AND NUM_HOSPITAL_CODE = HSCAM.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE) AS ROOM,
(SELECT STR_FLOOR_NAME FROM EST_FLOOR_MST WHERE GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM <= SYSDATE AND NVL (GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO, SYSDATE) >= SYSDATE AND GNUM_ISVALID = 1 AND NUM_FLOOR_ID = HSCAM.NUM_FLOOR_ID AND NUM_HOSPITAL_CODE = HSCAM.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE) AS FLOOR, (SELECT STR_BLOCK_NAME FROM EST_BLOCK_MST WHERE GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM <= SYSDATE AND NVL (GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO, SYSDATE) >= SYSDATE AND GNUM_ISVALID = 1 AND NUM_BLOCK_ID = HSCAM.NUM_BLOCK_ID AND NUM_HOSPITAL_CODE = HSCAM.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE) AS BLOCK, (SELECT STR_BUILDING_NAME FROM EST_BUILDING_MST WHERE GNUM_ISVALID = 1 AND NUM_BUILDING_CODE = HSCAM.NUM_BUILDING_CODE AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE = HSCAM.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE ) AS BUILDING FROM HIVT_LAB_COLLECTION_AREA_MST HLCAM, HIVT_SAM_COL_AREA_MST HSCAM WHERE hlcam.gnum_area_code = hscam.gnum_area_code AND hlcam.gnum_hospital_code = <HOSPITALCODE> AND hlcam.gnum_isvalid = 1 AND hscam.gnum_isvalid = 1 AND hlcam.gnum_lab_code IN ( SELECT DISTINCT gnum_lab_code FROM gblt_laboratory_mst c, hivt_laboratory_test_dtl a WHERE SUBSTR (a.gnum_lab_test_code, 6, 10) = #PK0# AND c.gnum_lab_code =SUBSTR (a.gnum_lab_test_code, 1, 5) AND a.gnum_hospital_code = <HOSPITALCODE> AND a.gnum_isvalid = 1 AND c.gnum_hospital_code = a.gnum_hospital_code AND c.gbl_isvalid = 1)) ORDER BY LAB_NAME

SELECT DISTINCT gstr_dept_name AS Department, gstr_dept_short "Department Short Name", NVL (a.hgstr_description, '-') || '' || (SELECT str_building_name FROM est_building_mst WHERE gnum_hospital_code = a.gnum_hospital_code AND num_building_code = a.hgstr_building
AND gnum_isvalid > 0) AS "Location" FROM hgbt_location_mst a, gblt_department_mst b WHERE b.gnum_dept_code =#PK0# AND b.gnum_hospital_code = <HOSPITALCODE> AND b.gnum_hospital_code = a.gnum_hospital_code AND (b.gnum_isvalid = 1 OR b.gnum_isvalid = 2) AND a.hgnum_location_code = b.gnum_location_code AND a.gnum_isvalid = 1

select DISTINCT (select HGSTR_UNITNAME from HGBT_UNIT_MST where HGNUM_DEPTUNITCODE=a.HGNUM_DEPTUNITCODE and GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE =<HOSPITALCODE> and GNUM_ISVALID=1) as UNIT_NAME, (SELECT STR_EMP_FULL_NAME FROM pist_emp_registration_dtl WHERE STR_EMP_NO = d.hgstr_emp_code and GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE =a.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE) as "HEAD OF UNIT", decode(b.HOPNUM_DAY_OF_WEEK,1,'Sunday',2,'Monday',3,'Tuesday',4,'Wednessday',5,'Thursday',6 ,'Friday',7,'Satarday') "day", (select HOPSTR_START_TIME from GBLT_SHIFT_MST where HGNUM_SHIFT_CODE=b.HGNUM_SHIFT_CODE and GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE =<HOSPITALCODE> and GNUM_ISVALID=1) ||'-'|| (select HOPSTR_END_TIME from GBLT_SHIFT_MST where HGNUM_SHIFT_CODE=b.HGNUM_SHIFT_CODE and GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE =<HOSPITALCODE> and GNUM_ISVALID=1)as UNIT_TIME, (select HGSTR_ROOM_NAME from HGBT_ROOM_MST where HGNUM_ROOM_CODE=c.HGNUM_ROOM_CODE and GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE =<HOSPITALCODE> and GNUM_ISVALID=1)as ROOM
from HGBT_UNIT_MST a,HOPT_DEPT_UNIT_ROSTER_MST b , HRGT_DEPT_UNIT_ROOM_MST c, HGBT_UNIT_CONSULTANT_MST d where (b.HGNUM_DEPTUNITCODE=a.HGNUM_DEPTUNITCODE) and (c.HGNUM_DEPTUNITCODE=a.HGNUM_DEPTUNITCODE) and (d.HGNUM_DEPTUNITCODE=a.HGNUM_DEPTUNITCODE) and HGNUM_IS_HOU=1 and a.gnum_isvalid=1 and a.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE =<HOSPITALCODE> and b.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE =<HOSPITALCODE> and c.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE =<HOSPITALCODE> and d.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE =<HOSPITALCODE> --AND hgnum_isgeneral = 2 AND hgnum_isgeneral NOT IN (2, 3) and hopnum_week_of_month=1 AND a.gnum_dept_code =#PK0# order by HGSTR_UNITNAME,b.HOPNUM_DAY_OF_WEEK
queryVO.totalRecordCountQuery: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (select DISTINCT a.HGNUM_DEPTUNITCODE,B.HOPNUM_DAY_OF_WEEK from HGBT_UNIT_MST a,HOPT_DEPT_UNIT_ROSTER_MST b , HRGT_DEPT_UNIT_ROOM_MST c, HGBT_UNIT_CONSULTANT_MST d where (b.HGNUM_DEPTUNITCODE=a.HGNUM_DEPTUNITCODE) and (c.HGNUM_DEPTUNITCODE=a.HGNUM_DEPTUNITCODE) and (d.HGNUM_DEPTUNITCODE=a.HGNUM_DEPTUNITCODE) and HGNUM_IS_HOU=1 and a.gnum_isvalid=1 and a.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE =<HOSPITALCODE> and b.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE =<HOSPITALCODE> and c.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE =<HOSPITALCODE> and d.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE =<HOSPITALCODE> --AND hgnum_isgeneral = 2 AND hgnum_isgeneral NOT IN (2, 3) and hopnum_week_of_month=1 AND a.gnum_dept_code =#PK0#)

queryVO.mainQuery:
select DISTINCT (select HGSTR_UNITNAME from HGBT_UNIT_MST where HGNUM_DEPTUNITCODE=a.HGNUM_DEPTUNITCODE and GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE =<HOSPITALCODE> and GNUM_ISVALID=1) as UNIT_NAME, (SELECT STR_EMP_FULL_NAME FROM pist_emp_registration_dtl WHERE STR_EMP_NO = d.hgstr_emp_code and GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE =a.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE) as "HEAD OF UNIT", decode(b.HOPNUM_DAY_OF_WEEK,1,'Sunday',2,'Monday',3,'Tuesday',4,'Wednessday',5,'Thursday',6 ,'Friday',7,'Satarday') "day", (select HOPSTR_START_TIME from GBLT_SHIFT_MST where HGNUM_SHIFT_CODE=b.HGNUM_SHIFT_CODE and GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE =<HOSPITALCODE> and GNUM_ISVALID=1) ||'-'|| (select HOPSTR_END_TIME from GBLT_SHIFT_MST where HGNUM_SHIFT_CODE=b.HGNUM_SHIFT_CODE and GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE =<HOSPITALCODE> and GNUM_ISVALID=1)as UNIT_TIME, (select HGSTR_ROOM_NAME from HGBT_ROOM_MST where HGNUM_ROOM_CODE=c.HGNUM_ROOM_CODE and GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE =<HOSPITALCODE> and GNUM_ISVALID=1)as ROOM
from HGBT_UNIT_MST a,HOPT_DEPT_UNIT_ROSTER_MST b , HRGT_DEPT_UNIT_ROOM_MST c, HGBT_UNIT_CONSULTANT_MST d where (b.HGNUM_DEPTUNITCODE=a.HGNUM_DEPTUNITCODE) and (c.HGNUM_DEPTUNITCODE=a.HGNUM_DEPTUNITCODE) and (d.HGNUM_DEPTUNITCODE=a.HGNUM_DEPTUNITCODE) and HGNUM_IS_HOU=1 and a.gnum_isvalid=1 and a.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE =<HOSPITALCODE> and b.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE =<HOSPITALCODE> and c.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE =<HOSPITALCODE> and d.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE =<HOSPITALCODE> AND hgnum_isgeneral = 2 and hopnum_week_of_month=1 AND a.gnum_dept_code =#PK0# order by HGSTR_UNITNAME,b.HOPNUM_DAY_OF_WEEK
queryVO.totalRecordCountQuery:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (select DISTINCT a.HGNUM_DEPTUNITCODE,B.HOPNUM_DAY_OF_WEEK
from HGBT_UNIT_MST a,HOPT_DEPT_UNIT_ROSTER_MST b , HRGT_DEPT_UNIT_ROOM_MST c, HGBT_UNIT_CONSULTANT_MST d where (b.HGNUM_DEPTUNITCODE=a.HGNUM_DEPTUNITCODE) and (c.HGNUM_DEPTUNITCODE=a.HGNUM_DEPTUNITCODE) and (d.HGNUM_DEPTUNITCODE=a.HGNUM_DEPTUNITCODE) and HGNUM_IS_HOU=1 and a.gnum_isvalid=1 and a.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE =<HOSPITALCODE> and b.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE =<HOSPITALCODE> and c.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE =<HOSPITALCODE> and d.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE =<HOSPITALCODE> AND hgnum_isgeneral = 2 and hopnum_week_of_month=1 AND a.gnum_dept_code =#PK0#)

queryVO.mainQuery: SELECT INITCAP(GSTR_DEPT_NAME)||'##'|| GNUM_DEPT_CODE ||'##1' DEPARTMENT , (SELECT DISTINCT 'VIEW SPECIAL CLINIC '||'##'||w.GNUM_DEPT_CODE||'##2' FROM HGBT_UNIT_MST w,HOPT_DEPT_UNIT_ROSTER_MST x , HRGT_DEPT_UNIT_ROOM_MST y, HGBT_UNIT_CONSULTANT_MST z WHERE (x.HGNUM_DEPTUNITCODE=w.HGNUM_DEPTUNITCODE) AND (y.HGNUM_DEPTUNITCODE=w.HGNUM_DEPTUNITCODE) AND (z.HGNUM_DEPTUNITCODE=w.HGNUM_DEPTUNITCODE) AND HGNUM_IS_HOU=1 AND w.GNUM_ISVALID=1 AND w.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE =A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE AND x.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE =A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE AND y.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE =A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE AND z.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE =A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE AND HGNUM_ISGENERAL = 2 AND HOPNUM_WEEK_OF_MONTH=1 AND w.GNUM_DEPT_CODE =A.GNUM_DEPT_CODE LIMIT 1 ) AS "-" FROM GBLT_DEPARTMENT_MST A WHERE gnum_dept_type = 1 AND a.gnum_isvalid IN (1,2) and upper(gstr_dept_name) ~ '#PARA#34#PARA#' AND a.gnum_hospital_code = <HOSPITALCODE> order by gstr_dept_name
queryVO.totalRecordCountQuery: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM gblt_department_mst a WHERE gnum_dept_type = 1 AND a.gnum_isvalid IN (1,2) and upper(gstr_dept_name) ~ '#PARA#34#PARA#' AND a.gnum_hospital_code = <HOSPITALCODE>

queryVO.mainQuery: SELECT gstr_lab_name || '##' || gnum_lab_code || '##1' "LABORATORY NAME", b.gstr_dept_name "DEPARTMENT" FROM gblt_laboratory_mst a, gblt_department_mst b WHERE a.gnum_dept_code = b.gnum_dept_code AND a.gnum_hospital_code = b.gnum_hospital_code AND b.gnum_isvalid = 1 AND a.gnum_hospital_code = <HOSPITALCODE> and b.GNUM_DEPT_CODE=#PARA#28#PARA# and UPPER (gstr_lab_name) ~ '#PARA#29#PARA#' AND a.gbl_isvalid = 1 order by gstr_lab_name
queryVO.totalRecordCountQuery: SELECT count(*) FROM gblt_laboratory_mst a, gblt_department_mst b WHERE a.gnum_dept_code = b.gnum_dept_code AND a.gnum_hospital_code = b.gnum_hospital_code AND b.gnum_isvalid = 1 AND a.gnum_hospital_code = <HOSPITALCODE> and b.GNUM_DEPT_CODE=#PARA#28#PARA# and UPPER (gstr_lab_name) ~ '#PARA#29#PARA#' AND a.gbl_isvalid = 1

queryVO.mainQuery: SELECT distinct hrgnum_puk "cr no.", initcap(hrgstr_fname) ||decode(hrgstr_mname,null,'', ' '|| initcap(hrgstr_mname)) ||decode(hrgstr_lname,null,'', ' '|| initcap(hrgstr_lname)) || '##'|| hrgnum_puk ||'##1' as Patient_Name, TO_CHAR (a.hrgdt_episode_start_date, 'dd-Mon-yyyy') AS Visit_Date , initcap(a.gstr_dept_name) AS Department, gstr_gender_name ||'/'||hrgstr_age as "Gender/Age", --a.hgnum_pat_status_code,DECODE (a.hgnum_pat_status_code, 11, 'Admitted', 12, 'Not Admitted', 13, 'Dead', 14, 'Not Dead' ) AS Status, hrgstr_father_name||'/'||hrgstr_spousename as "Father/Spouse", initcap(a.hrgstr_father_name) ||'/'|| initcap(a.hrgstr_spousename) as "Father/Spouse", decode( a.hrgstr_address_line1, null ,'', a.hrgstr_address_line1||',') || decode( a.hrgstr_sub_locality1, null ,'', a.hrgstr_sub_locality1||',') || decode( a.hrgstr_city_location, null ,'', a.hrgstr_city_location||',') || decode( a.hrgstr_city, null ,'', a.hrgstr_city||',') || decode( a.hrgstr_district, null ,'', a.hrgstr_district||',') || decode( a.hrgstr_state_name, null ,'', a.hrgstr_state_name||',') || decode( a.gstr_country_name, null ,'', a.gstr_country_name||',') || decode( a.hrgnum_pincode, null ,'', '-'||a.hrgnum_pincode) Address, gstr_hospital_name Hospital FROM hrgt_daily_patient_dtl a where gnum_isvalid=1 and a.gstr_country_code='#PARA#14#PARA#' and a.gnum_state_code =#PARA#15#PARA# and a.gnum_district_code=#PARA#16#PARA# and a.gstr_gender_code=#PARA#10#PARA# and a.hrgnum_is_mlc=#PARA#13#PARA# and a.hrgnum_is_broughtdead=#PARA#12#PARA# and a.hrgnum_isunknown=#PARA#11#PARA# AND gnum_dept_code = #PARA#18#PARA# and UPPER(a.hrgstr_father_name)~ '#PARA#6#PARA#' and UPPER(a.hrgstr_spousename)~ '#PARA#7#PARA#' and hrgstr_mobile_no =#PARA#17#PARA# AND UPPER (trim(hrgstr_fname)) || UPPER (trim(hrgstr_mname)) || UPPER (trim(hrgstr_lname)) ~ '#PARA#3#PARA#' AND a.hrgnum_puk=#PARA#5#PARA# AND a.gnum_hospital_code = <HOSPITALCODE> ORDER BY a.hrgdt_episode_start_date Desc ,Patient_Name
queryVO.totalRecordCountQuery: select count(*) from ( SELECT distinct hrgnum_puk FROM hrgt_daily_patient_dtl a where gnum_isvalid=1 and a.gstr_country_code='#PARA#14#PARA#' and a.gnum_state_code =#PARA#15#PARA# and a.gnum_district_code=#PARA#16#PARA# and a.gstr_gender_code=#PARA#10#PARA# and a.hrgnum_is_mlc=#PARA#13#PARA# and a.hrgnum_is_broughtdead=#PARA#12#PARA# and a.hrgnum_isunknown=#PARA#11#PARA# AND gnum_dept_code = #PARA#18#PARA# and UPPER(a.hrgstr_father_name)~ '#PARA#6#PARA#' and UPPER(a.hrgstr_spousename)~ '#PARA#7#PARA#' and hrgstr_mobile_no =#PARA#17#PARA# AND UPPER (trim(hrgstr_fname)) || UPPER (trim(hrgstr_mname)) || UPPER (trim(hrgstr_lname)) ~ '#PARA#3#PARA#' AND a.hrgnum_puk=#PARA#5#PARA# AND a.gnum_hospital_code = <HOSPITALCODE> )

queryVO.mainQuery: SELECT A.HRGNUM_PUK "CR No.", HRGNUM_NAME AS "PATIENT NAME", DECODE(HRGSTR_SEX,1,'M',2,'F','U') ||'/'|| HRGNUM_AGE || ' ' || HRGSTR_AGEUNIT AS "GENDER /AGE", TO_CHAR(A.HIPDT_ADMDATETIME,'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI') AS "ADMISSION DATE", pkg_clinical_gbl_fun.get_dept_name(A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE::character varying,A.GNUM_DEPT_CODE::character varying) AS "DEPARTMENT", pkg_clinical_gbl_fun.get_ward_name(A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE::character varying,HIPNUM_WARD_CODE::character varying) ||' /'|| ipd_mst.GETBEDNAME(HIPNUM_BED_CODE,GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE) as "ward/bed", HRGSTR_FATHUSBNAME||'/'||HRGSTR_SPOUSENAME as "Father/Spouse", HRGSTR_CITY AS CITY , 'VIEW##'||A.HRGNUM_PUK||'##1' AS "DETAILS" FROM HIPT_PATADMDISC_DTL A WHERE A.GNUM_ISVALID = 1 AND HIPDT_ADMSTATUS_CODE NOT IN (13,14) AND HIPDT_BEDALLOC_DATETIME IS NOT NULL and HIPDT_DISDATETIME is null AND A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE =<HOSPITALCODE> and A.HIPNUM_ADMNO=#PARA#4#PARA# and A.HRGNUM_PUK=#PARA#5#PARA# and UPPER (HRGNUM_NAME) ~ '#PARA#3#PARA#' and a.HRGSTR_SEX=#PARA#10#PARA# and UPPER (HRGSTR_FATHUSBNAME) ~ '#PARA#6#PARA#' UPPER (HRGSTR_SPOUSENAME) ~ '#PARA#7#PARA#' AND UPPER (HRGSTR_CITY)~ '#PARA#37#PARA#' and a.GNUM_DEPT_CODE=#PARA#18#PARA# order by HIPDT_DISDATETIME desc
queryVO.totalRecordCountQuery: SELECT count(*) FROM HIPT_PATADMDISC_DTL A WHERE A.GNUM_ISVALID = 1 AND HIPDT_ADMSTATUS_CODE NOT IN (13,14) AND HIPDT_BEDALLOC_DATETIME IS NOT NULL and HIPDT_DISDATETIME is null AND A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE =<HOSPITALCODE> and A.HIPNUM_ADMNO=#PARA#4#PARA# and A.HRGNUM_PUK=#PARA#5#PARA# and UPPER (HRGNUM_NAME) ~ '#PARA#3#PARA#' and a.HRGSTR_SEX=#PARA#10#PARA# and UPPER (HRGSTR_FATHUSBNAME) ~ '#PARA#6#PARA#' UPPER (HRGSTR_SPOUSENAME) ~ '#PARA#7#PARA#' AND UPPER (HRGSTR_CITY)~ '#PARA#37#PARA#' and a.GNUM_DEPT_CODE=#PARA#18#PARA# order by HIPDT_DISDATETIME desc

queryVO.mainQuery: SELECT DISTINCT a.hrgnum_puk "CR No.", INITCAP (a.hrgstr_fname) || ' ' || INITCAP (a.hrgstr_mname) || ' ' || INITCAP (a.hrgstr_lname) AS "Patient Name" FROM hrgt_patient_dtl a WHERE a.hrgnum_puk = #PK0# AND gnum_hospital_code = <HOSPITALCODE> AND gnum_isvalid = 1

SELECT (SELECT gstr_dept_name FROM gblt_department_mst WHERE gnum_dept_code = a.gnum_dept_code AND gnum_isvalid = 1 AND gnum_hospital_code = a.gnum_hospital_code AND gnum_hospital_code = a.gnum_hospital_code ) "Department", (SELECT DISTINCT hgstr_unitname FROM hgbt_unit_mst WHERE hgnum_deptunitcode = a.hgnum_deptunitcode AND gnum_isvalid = 1 AND gnum_hospital_code = a.gnum_hospital_code AND gnum_hospital_code = a.gnum_hospital_code ) Unit, (SELECT hgstr_room_name FROM hgbt_room_mst WHERE hgnum_room_code = a.hgnum_room_code AND gnum_isvalid = 1 AND gnum_hospital_code = a.gnum_hospital_code) Room, to_char(nvl(hrgdt_episode_lastvisit_date,hrgdt_episode_start_date),'dd-Mon-yyyy') "Last Visit Date" FROM hrgt_episode_dtl a WHERE a.gnum_isvalid = 1 AND a.hrgnum_puk = #PK0# AND a.gnum_hospital_code = <HOSPITALCODE> AND hrgnum_visit_no = (SELECT MAX (hrgnum_visit_no) FROM hrgt_episode_dtl WHERE hrgnum_puk = #PK0# AND gnum_isvalid = 1 AND hrgnum_episode_code = a.hrgnum_episode_code AND gnum_hospital_code = a.gnum_hospital_code) order by nvl(hrgdt_episode_lastvisit_date,hrgdt_episode_start_date) desc

SELECT ( SELECT initcap(gstr_dept_name) department FROM gblt_department_mst b WHERE gnum_dept_type = 1 AND a.gnum_isvalid =1 AND b.gnum_hospital_code = a.gnum_hospital_code and b.gnum_dept_code=a.gnum_dept_code ) Department_Name, ( SELECT INITCAP (g.hgstr_unitname) FROM hgbt_unit_mst g WHERE gnum_isvalid = 1 AND gnum_hospital_code = a.gnum_hospital_code and g.hgnum_deptunitcode = a.HOPNUM_DEPTUNITCODE ) unit , ( SELECT hgstr_room_name FROM hgbt_room_mst WHERE gnum_isvalid = a.gnum_isvalid AND gnum_hospital_code = a.gnum_hospital_code AND hgnum_room_code = a.hgnum_room_code ) room , to_char(HOPDT_START_DT,'hh:mi:am') ||'-'|| to_char(HOPDT_END_DT,'hh:mi:am') Duration FROM HOPT_DEPT_UNIT_ROSTER_DTL a WHERE gnum_isvalid = 1 AND gnum_hospital_code = <HOSPITALCODE> AND trunc(HOPDT_START_DT) = trunc(sysdate) AND GNUM_DEPT_CODE = '#PARA#18#PARA#' order by Department_Name,unit
queryVO.totalRecordCountQuery: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HOPT_DEPT_UNIT_ROSTER_DTL a WHERE gnum_isvalid = 1 AND gnum_hospital_code = <HOSPITALCODE> AND trunc(HOPDT_START_DT) = trunc(sysdate) AND GNUM_DEPT_CODE = '#PARA#18#PARA#'

queryVO.mainQuery: SELECT IPD_MST.GETWARDNAME(A.HIPNUM_WARD_CODE,A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE) wardName, --DECODE(B.HGNUM_BED_STATUS_CODE,10,'Vacant',12,'Occupied',13,'Blocked') bed_Status, COUNT(B.HGNUM_BED_CODE) bedCount FROM HIPT_DUWRBED_MST A,HIPT_WARD_ROOM_BED_MST B WHERE A.GNUM_ISVALID=1 AND A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=101 AND A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE = B.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE AND A.HGNUM_BED_CODE = B.HGNUM_BED_CODE AND A.HIPNUM_ROOM_NO = B.HIPNUM_ROOM_NO and A.HIPNUM_WARD_CODE=#PARA#50#PARA# and B.HGNUM_BED_STATUS_CODE=#PARA#49#PARA# AND A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=<HOSPITALCODE> GROUP BY A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE,A.HIPNUM_WARD_CODE,B.HGNUM_BED_STATUS_CODE ORDER BY A.HIPNUM_WARD_CODE,B.HGNUM_BED_STATUS_CODE
queryVO.totalRecordCountQuery: select count(*) from( SELECT A.HIPNUM_WARD_CODE FROM HIPT_DUWRBED_MST A,HIPT_WARD_ROOM_BED_MST B WHERE A.GNUM_ISVALID=1 AND A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=101 AND A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE = B.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE AND A.HGNUM_BED_CODE = B.HGNUM_BED_CODE AND A.HIPNUM_ROOM_NO = B.HIPNUM_ROOM_NO and A.HIPNUM_WARD_CODE=#PARA#50#PARA# and B.HGNUM_BED_STATUS_CODE=#PARA#49#PARA# AND A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=<HOSPITALCODE> GROUP BY A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE,A.HIPNUM_WARD_CODE,B.HGNUM_BED_STATUS_CODE )

queryVO.mainQuery: SELECT DISTINCT GSTR_TEST_NAME ||'##'||GNUM_TEST_CODE||'##1' "TEST_NAME" FROM GBLT_LABORATORY_MST C,HIVT_LABORATORY_TEST_DTL A,GBLT_TEST_MST B WHERE SUBSTR (A.GNUM_LAB_TEST_CODE, 6, 10)= GNUM_TEST_CODE AND C.GNUM_LAB_CODE= SUBSTR (A.GNUM_LAB_TEST_CODE, 1, 5) AND A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE = 101 --<HOSPITALCODE> AND A.GNUM_ISVALID = 1 AND B.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE = A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE AND B.GNUM_ISVALID = A.GNUM_ISVALID AND C.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE = A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE AND C.GBL_ISVALID = 1 AND B.GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM <= SYSDATE AND (TO_DATE (NVL (B.GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO, SYSDATE), 'DD-MM-YY') >= TO_DATE (SYSDATE, 'DD-MM-YY')) and UPPER (gstr_test_name)~ '#PARA#26#PARA#' and SUBSTR (a.gnum_lab_test_code, 1, 5)= #PARA#27#PARA# and DECODE(SUBSTR(GCHAR_TEST_DAY,(extract(dow from sysdate)+1)::numeric,1),'1',extract(dow from sysdate),0)= extract(dow from sysdate) ORDER BY GSTR_TEST_NAME
queryVO.totalRecordCountQuery: select count(*) from ( SELECT DISTINCT GSTR_TEST_NAME ||'##'||GNUM_TEST_CODE||'##1' "TEST_NAME" FROM GBLT_LABORATORY_MST C,HIVT_LABORATORY_TEST_DTL A,GBLT_TEST_MST B WHERE SUBSTR (A.GNUM_LAB_TEST_CODE, 6, 10)= GNUM_TEST_CODE AND C.GNUM_LAB_CODE= SUBSTR (A.GNUM_LAB_TEST_CODE, 1, 5) AND A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE = 101 --<HOSPITALCODE> AND A.GNUM_ISVALID = 1 AND B.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE = A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE AND B.GNUM_ISVALID = A.GNUM_ISVALID AND C.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE = A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE AND C.GBL_ISVALID = 1 AND B.GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM <= SYSDATE AND (TO_DATE (NVL (B.GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO, SYSDATE), 'DD-MM-YY') >= TO_DATE (SYSDATE, 'DD-MM-YY')) and UPPER (gstr_test_name)~ '#PARA#26#PARA#' and SUBSTR (a.gnum_lab_test_code, 1, 5)= #PARA#27#PARA# and DECODE(SUBSTR(GCHAR_TEST_DAY,(extract(dow from sysdate)+1)::numeric,1),'1',extract(dow from sysdate),0)= extract(dow from sysdate) )

queryVO.mainQuery:
select DISTINCT (SELECT gstr_dept_name FROM gblt_department_mst WHERE gnum_dept_code = a.gnum_dept_code AND gnum_isvalid = a.gnum_isvalid LIMIT 1) AS department, (SELECT hgstr_unitname FROM hgbt_unit_mst WHERE hgnum_deptunitcode = a.gnum_deptunit_code AND gnum_isvalid = a.gnum_isvalid LIMIT 1 ) unit,
( select STR_EMP_FULL_NAME from pist_emp_registration_dtl where STR_EMP_NO=A.pstr_emp_no and GNUM_ISVALID!=2 LIMIT 1 ) Surgeon from hott_surgeon_roster_mst A WHERE extract(dow from sysdate)=hotnum_dow and a.gnum_deptunit_code=#PARA#18#PARA# and A.GNUM_ISVALID<>2 ORDER BY department,unit
queryVO.totalRecordCountQuery:
select count(*) from ( select DISTINCT (SELECT gstr_dept_name FROM gblt_department_mst WHERE gnum_dept_code = a.gnum_dept_code AND gnum_isvalid = a.gnum_isvalid LIMIT 1) AS department, (SELECT hgstr_unitname FROM hgbt_unit_mst WHERE hgnum_deptunitcode = a.gnum_deptunit_code AND gnum_isvalid = a.gnum_isvalid LIMIT 1 ) unit,
( select STR_EMP_FULL_NAME from pist_emp_registration_dtl where STR_EMP_NO=A.pstr_emp_no and GNUM_ISVALID!=2 LIMIT 1 ) Surgeon from hott_surgeon_roster_mst A WHERE extract(dow from sysdate)=hotnum_dow and a.gnum_deptunit_code=#PARA#18#PARA# and A.GNUM_ISVALID<>2 )

queryVO.mainQuery:
select DISTINCT DECODE (hotnum_dow, 1, 'Mon', 2, 'Tue', 3, 'Wed', 4, 'Thu', 5, 'Fri', 6, 'Sat', 7, 'Sun' ) DAY_OF_WEEK, (SELECT gstr_dept_name FROM gblt_department_mst WHERE gnum_dept_code = a.gnum_dept_code AND gnum_isvalid = a.gnum_isvalid LIMIT 1) AS department, (SELECT hgstr_unitname FROM hgbt_unit_mst WHERE hgnum_deptunitcode = a.gnum_deptunit_code AND gnum_isvalid = a.gnum_isvalid LIMIT 1 ) unit,
( select STR_EMP_FULL_NAME from pist_emp_registration_dtl where STR_EMP_NO=A.pstr_emp_no and GNUM_ISVALID!=2 LIMIT 1 ) Surgeon from hott_surgeon_roster_mst A WHERE a.GNUM_ISVALID<>2 and a.gnum_deptunit_code=#PARA#18#PARA# and hotnum_dow=#PARA#51#PARA# ORDER BY department,unit
queryVO.totalRecordCountQuery: select count(*) from ( select DISTINCT DECODE (hotnum_dow, 1, 'Mon', 2, 'Tue', 3, 'Wed', 4, 'Thu', 5, 'Fri', 6, 'Sat', 7, 'Sun' ) DAY_OF_WEEK,a.gnum_dept_code, a.gnum_deptunit_code, A.pstr_emp_no from hott_surgeon_roster_mst A WHERE a.GNUM_ISVALID<>2 and a.gnum_deptunit_code=#PARA#18#PARA# and hotnum_dow=#PARA#51#PARA# )

queryVO.mainQuery: SELECT hblstr_tariff_name "Tariff Name", (SELECT hblstr_group_name FROM hblt_group_mst WHERE hblnum_group_id = a.hblnum_group_id AND TRUNC (gdt_effective_frm) <= TRUNC (SYSDATE) AND gnum_isvalid = a.gnum_isvalid AND gnum_hospital_code = a.gnum_hospital_code) "Group Name" FROM hblt_tariff_mst a WHERE gnum_hospital_code = <HOSPITALCODE> AND gnum_isvalid = 1 AND TRUNC (gdt_effective_frm) <= TRUNC (SYSDATE) and hblnum_tariff_id=#PK0#

SELECT PATCAT as "Patient Category", CHARGETYPE ||' ' ||IPDCHARGETYPE AS "CHARGE TYPE", CHARGE "CHARGE IN RS." from( SELECT hblnum_tariff_id||sblnum_chargetype_id||sblnum_ipd_chargetype_id as pk, hblnum_tariff_id tariffid, (SELECT hblstr_tariff_name FROM hblt_tariff_mst WHERE hblnum_tariff_id = a.hblnum_tariff_id limit 1) tariffname, gnum_patient_cat_code patcatcode, sblnum_chargetype_id || '|' || sblnum_ipd_chargetype_id chargetypeid, (SELECT sblstr_chargetype_name FROM sblt_chargetype_mst WHERE sblnum_chargetype_id = a.sblnum_chargetype_id AND gnum_isvalid = a.gnum_isvalid limit 1) chargetype, hblnum_cost::CHARACTER VARYING charge, (SELECT gstr_patient_cat_name FROM gblt_patient_cat_mst WHERE gnum_patient_cat_code = a.gnum_patient_cat_code AND gnum_hospital_code = a.gnum_hospital_code AND gnum_isvalid = a.gnum_isvalid AND TRUNC (gdt_effective_frm) <= TRUNC (SYSDATE) AND TRUNC (NVL (gdt_effective_to, SYSDATE)) >= TRUNC (SYSDATE) limit 1) patcat, sblnum_ipd_chargetype_id ipdchargetypeid, (SELECT sblstr_ipd_chargetype_name FROM sblt_ipd_chargetype_mst WHERE sblnum_ipd_chargetype_id = a.sblnum_ipd_chargetype_id AND gnum_isvalid = a.gnum_isvalid AND TRUNC (gdt_effective_frm) <= TRUNC (SYSDATE) limit 1) ipdchargetype, DECODE (sblnum_chargetype_id || '|' || sblnum_ipd_chargetype_id, '1|0', 0, '2|1', 1, '2|2', 2, 3 ) indexid FROM hblt_charge_mst a WHERE gnum_hospital_code = <HOSPITALCODE> AND gnum_isvalid = 1 AND hblnum_tariff_id =#PK0# -- and gnum_patient_cat_code=11 union --aLL SELECT hblnum_tariff_id||'21' as pk, hblnum_tariff_id tariffid, (SELECT hblstr_tariff_name FROM hblt_tariff_mst WHERE hblnum_tariff_id = a.hblnum_tariff_id limit 1) tariffname, gnum_patient_cat_code patcatcode, '2|1' chargetypeid, 'IPD' chargetype, decode(to_number(BILL_MST.GETCHARGEDETAILS(9::NUMERIC,GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE::NUMERIC,1::NUMERIC,A.GNUM_PATIENT_CAT_CODE::NUMERIC,2::NUMERIC,HBLNUM_TARIFF_ID,GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM::CHARACTER VARYING)),0,hblnum_cost, to_number(BILL_MST.GETCHARGEDETAILS(9::NUMERIC,GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE,1::NUMERIC,A.GNUM_PATIENT_CAT_CODE,2::NUMERIC,HBLNUM_TARIFF_ID,GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM::CHARACTER VARYING))) AS charge, (SELECT gstr_patient_cat_name FROM gblt_patient_cat_mst WHERE gnum_patient_cat_code = a.gnum_patient_cat_code AND gnum_hospital_code = a.gnum_hospital_code AND gnum_isvalid = a.gnum_isvalid AND TRUNC (gdt_effective_frm) <= TRUNC (SYSDATE) AND TRUNC (NVL (gdt_effective_to, SYSDATE)) >= TRUNC (SYSDATE) limit 1) patcat, 1 ipdchargetypeid, 'GENERAL' ipdchargetype, DECODE ('2|1' , '1|0', 0, '2|1', 1, '2|2', 2, 3 ) indexid FROM hblt_charge_mst a WHERE gnum_hospital_code = <HOSPITALCODE> AND gnum_isvalid = 1 AND hblnum_tariff_id = #PK0# and sblnum_chargetype_id=1 and sblnum_ipd_chargetype_id=0 AND TRUNC (gdt_effective_frm) <= TRUNC (SYSDATE) AND TRUNC (NVL (gdt_effective_to, SYSDATE)) >= TRUNC (SYSDATE) -- and gnum_patient_cat_code=11 ) where CHARGE<>0 order by patcatcode,indexid

SELECT DISTINCT a.hrgnum_puk "CR No.", INITCAP (a.hrgstr_fname) || ' ' || INITCAP (a.hrgstr_mname) || ' ' || INITCAP (a.hrgstr_lname) AS "Patient Name" FROM hrgt_patient_dtl a WHERE a.hrgnum_puk = #PK0# AND gnum_hospital_code = <HOSPITALCODE> AND gnum_isvalid = 1

SELECT (SELECT gstr_dept_name FROM gblt_department_mst WHERE gnum_dept_code = a.gnum_dept_code AND gnum_isvalid = 1 AND gnum_hospital_code = a.gnum_hospital_code ) "Department", (SELECT DISTINCT hgstr_unitname FROM hgbt_unit_mst WHERE hgnum_deptunitcode = a.hgnum_deptunitcode AND gnum_isvalid = 1 AND gnum_hospital_code = a.gnum_hospital_code ) Unit, (SELECT hgstr_room_name FROM hgbt_room_mst WHERE hgnum_room_code = a.hgnum_room_code AND gnum_isvalid = 1 AND gnum_hospital_code = a.gnum_hospital_code) Room, to_char(nvl(hrgdt_episode_lastvisit_date,hrgdt_episode_start_date),'dd-Mon-yyyy') "Last Visit Date" FROM hrgt_episode_dtl a WHERE a.gnum_isvalid = 1 AND a.hrgnum_puk = #PK0# AND a.gnum_hospital_code = <HOSPITALCODE> AND hrgnum_visit_no = (SELECT MAX (hrgnum_visit_no) FROM hrgt_episode_dtl WHERE hrgnum_puk = #PK0# AND gnum_isvalid = 1 AND hrgnum_episode_code = a.hrgnum_episode_code AND gnum_hospital_code = a.gnum_hospital_code)

SELECT a.hipnum_admno as "Admission No.", TO_CHAR (a.hipdt_admdatetime, 'dd-Mon-yyyy') " Admission Date", (SELECT gstr_dept_name FROM gblt_department_mst WHERE gnum_dept_code = a.gnum_dept_code AND gnum_isvalid = 1 AND gnum_hospital_code = a.gnum_hospital_code ) as Department, (SELECT DISTINCT hgstr_unitname FROM hgbt_unit_mst WHERE hgnum_deptunitcode = a.gnum_deptunit_code AND gnum_isvalid = 1 AND gnum_hospital_code = a.gnum_hospital_code ) "Unit", (SELECT hipstr_ward_name FROM hipt_ward_mst WHERE hipnum_ward_code = a.hipnum_ward_code AND gnum_isvalid = 1 AND gnum_hospital_code = a.gnum_hospital_code) ||'/'|| (SELECT hgnum_bed_name FROM hipt_ward_room_bed_mst WHERE hgnum_bed_code = a.hipnum_bed_code AND hipnum_room_no = a.hipnum_room_code AND hgnum_ward_code = a.hipnum_ward_code AND gnum_isvalid = 1 AND gnum_hospital_code = a.gnum_hospital_code) "Ward/Bed", DECODE (a.hipdt_admstatus_code, 12, 'Admitted', 13, 'LAMA', 14, 'Admission Cancelled', 15, 'On leave', 16, 'Discharged' ) "Status", TO_CHAR (b.hipdt_disdatetime, 'dd-Mon-yyyy') "Discharged Date" FROM hipt_patadmission_dtl a, hipt_patadmdisc_dtl b WHERE a.hipnum_admno = b.hipnum_admno AND a.hrgnum_puk = #PK0# AND a.gnum_isvalid = 1 AND a.gnum_isvalid = b.gnum_isvalid AND a.gnum_hospital_code = <HOSPITALCODE> AND a.gnum_hospital_code = b.gnum_hospital_code

SELECT IPD_MST.GETWARDNAME(A.HIPNUM_WARD_CODE,A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE) wardName, --DECODE(B.HGNUM_BED_STATUS_CODE,10,'Vacant',12,'Occupied',13,'Blocked') Bed Count, COUNT(B.HGNUM_BED_CODE) bedCount FROM HIPT_DUWRBED_MST A,HIPT_WARD_ROOM_BED_MST B WHERE A.GNUM_ISVALID=1 AND A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=101 AND A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE = B.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE AND A.HGNUM_BED_CODE = B.HGNUM_BED_CODE AND A.HIPNUM_ROOM_NO = B.HIPNUM_ROOM_NO and A.HIPNUM_WARD_CODE=#PARA#50#PARA# and B.HGNUM_BED_STATUS_CODE=#PARA#49#PARA# AND A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=<HOSPITALCODE> GROUP BY A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE,A.HIPNUM_WARD_CODE,B.HGNUM_BED_STATUS_CODE ORDER BY A.HIPNUM_WARD_CODE,B.HGNUM_BED_STATUS_CODE
